# Introduction

The posterior distribution is obtained from the prior distribution and sampling model via *Bayesâ€™ rule*:

$$p(\theta \mid y)=\frac{p(y \mid \theta) p(\theta)}{\int_{\Theta} p(y \mid \tilde{\theta}) p(\tilde{\theta}) d \tilde{\theta}}.$$


This is a book created from markdown and executable code.

See @knuth84 for additional discussion of literate programming.
